articles.title: MFs can now participate in repos on Commercial Papers, Certificate of Deposits - Moneycontrol
articles.description: SEBI had first allowed the participation of mutual funds in repo in corporate debt securities in 2011. The fund houses were then allowed to participate in repo transactions only in AAA-rated corporate debt securities.
articles.content: To develop the corporate bond market from the perspective of mutual funds, the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) has allowed asset management companies to participate in repos on Commerci… [+2688 chars]
